title: ‘A Lot of the Races Are Boring Because He’s so Good’: Sean Kelly Weary of the Tadej Pogačar Procession
content:
For some, world number one Pogačar is the most exciting thing to happen to the sport in years. Kelly feels otherwise.

Read the full article at ‘A Lot of the Races Are Boring Because He’s so Good’: Sean Kelly Weary of the Tadej Pogačar Procession on Velo.
author: sstokes
